articles.title: Halftime dancer waves flag in protest, detained - ESPN
articles.description: A person in Kendrick Lamar's Super Bowl halftime show, a confirmed performer in the 400-member field cast, was detained on the field Sunday night and could face charges after unfurling a Sudanese-Palestinian flag with "Sudan" and "Gaza" written on it.
